1.name: Standard
1.description: The game ends after all links have been placed.

2.name: Short
2.description: The game ends after all links have been placed placed OR as soon as any player reached 90 points.

1.name: On
1.description: Players are allowed to undo their entire turn.

2.name: Off
2.description: Each move within a turn is final and cannot be undone.
